content: I apologize, but I think I made a mistake. I got a bit carried away with the ideas and forgot to mention Rachel, whom I met at a writing workshop at the local library last month. She's been a great help in keeping me motivated and providing feedback on my writing. I was wondering if I could incorporate her character into this story somehow, maybe as a guide or a mentor who helps my character navigate the realm of shadows and light. What do you think?
